what: Apply IOM theme to a plot — apply_theme
title: Apply IOM theme to a plot — apply_theme
text: Adds thematic presets adhering IOM visual branding ggplot object.

title: Apply IOM theme to a plot — apply_theme
code: apply_theme(type, basesize = 7, font = "Gill Sans Nova", facets = FALSE)

title: Apply IOM theme to a plot — apply_theme
text: type type plot themed? Accepts "line", "bar-horizontal", "bar-vertical", "map", "void". basesize Font size points. Default 10. font Font family. Default Open Sans. facets faceted plot?

title: Apply IOM theme to a plot — apply_theme
text: basesize parameter used font size axis labels titles plot annotations.

title: Choose an IOM color — pal
text: Choose IOM color

title: Choose an IOM color — pal
text: color Accepts "blues", "unblues", "yellows", "greens", "oranges", "reds", "grays". shade shade chosen color, 1 (darkest) 5 (lightest). Accepts vectors.

title: Choose an IOM color — pal
text: Hex code/s string vector strings.

title: Pretty number formatting — prettylabel
text: Formats numbers display charts.

title: Pretty number formatting — prettylabel
code: prettylabel(   N,   signif = 2,   spell = FALSE,   padzero = FALSE,   pct = FALSE,   currency = NULL )

title: Pretty number formatting — prettylabel
text: N Number vector numbers formatted. signif Number significant digits. spell Whether spell "millions", "billions", "trillions". padzero Whether include zeros decimal point. pct Whether include percent sign. currency Whether add currency sign. shorten Whether abbreviate long numbers.

title: Pretty number formatting — prettylabel
text: String vector strings.
